snippet: Tottenham Manager Andre Villas-Boas rebuked the “incompetent people” who have been critical of the decision to allow goalkeeper Hugo Lloris to continue playing after he was knocked unconscious.
abstract: Tottenham Manager Andre Villas-Boas rebukes those who have been critical of decision to allow goalkeeper Hugo Lloris to continue playing after he was knocked unconscious.
lead_paragraph: Tottenham Manager Andre Villas-Boas rebuked the “incompetent people” who have been critical of the decision to allow goalkeeper Hugo Lloris to continue playing after he was knocked unconscious.
